short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables highlighting, commenting, note-taking, and discussions on the Watchtower. See and share notes with others worldwide!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WatchtowerHelper Chrome extension opens up your Watchtower study to a global community. 

Add and share highlights, comments, and footnotes, all from within the JW.org website itself! 

Join in global discussions of posts via links to the Watchtower Help Club forum.

Take your commenting to a whole new level by using this tool to connect to a global community of people discussing the Watchtower! Gain and share insights with others from around the world!

Get fresh perspectives from those outside your congregation, and share them with your congregation!

Thanks to the extension's policy of total anonymity, freely ask questions and post comments that you might hesitate to broach in your congregation.

Didn't get a chance to study the Watchtower for the upcoming meeting? Print out the global highlights and comments, and bring the printout with you to the Kingdom Hall: instant preparation for such situations!
